attributes.action: All keyworkers to receive hazard pay if are working during the pandemicofCOVID19
attributes.additional_details: Most key workers are not paid hazard pay or any kind of bonus for the life danger are putting themselves working during the pandemic of COVID19. They put themselves and there families in life threatening situation and lots of stress and some big companies earning huge profits after there work .
attributes.background: Most key workers are not paid hazard pay or any kind of bonus for the life danger are putting themselves working during the pandemic of COVID19 . Parliament should implement a rule so the key workers receive some kind of benefits or bonuses for working during the pandemic to keep the country running

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
